gather.name: gather
gather.description: With Gather you can create and manage surveys and surveyors, monitor the progress of data collection, and explore, mask and download your data as it comes in.

kibana.name: Kibana
kibana.description: Send your data to Kibana and create various types of charts, tables and maps for visualizing, analyzing, and exploring the data.

kernel-ui.name: aether
kernel-ui.description: Aether enables you to extract, mask and publish data to other platforms by creating a pipeline to map your existing data structure to your desired output.

kernel.name: < Kernel >
kernel.description: The Aether Kernel provides common functionality, such as logging and authentication.

odk.name: < ODK >
odk.description: Aether Core modules provide generally useful components for data input and application communication. The ODK module can be used to, for example, for serving XForms to ODK Collect.
